20110111043555.000|20110111043556.000|CC1|BETWEEN A PAC AND STATE PAC.    
20110111043556.000|20110111043556.000|CC1|MR. DELAY WAS TAKEN INTO CUSTODY
20110111043556.000|20110111043558.000|CC1|IMMEDIATELY TO BE PROCESSED TO
